title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.7 - Determination of starting position
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.7 - Determination of starting position

State Regulations

The position of horses when starting shall be
determined by lot, i.e., a numbered ball shall be drawn from a bottle by the
clerk of the scales. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4034.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
